title: Zombies In My Basement
description: Zombies have moved into Todd's house and taken over the basement. His friend Brad is very brave and decides to go see what they are doing down there, unaware that he's going to learn more than they ever thought possible. "Zombies In My Basemet" is a children's tale that follows Todd and Brad as they learn what Zombies like to eat and do. They discover that even though most people are afraid of zombies and wouldn't like them to move in, sometimes you can be surprised with that you will find when you take the time to get to know someone.
author: Katrina Holmes
